venue.name: Christ Church United, UCC, in Lowell

item.description: Commit eight Wednesday evenings to growing your faith with others who are seeking to walk more closely with God in Christ Jesus. In this series, The Way of Grace, we will study eight biblical characters who discover God’s grace in their encounters with Jesus... As we journey together, we too will have many opportunities to discover deeper dimensions of God’s grace. We will share insights and explore new ways of seeing God’s active presence in our lives – both personally and in the settings of our common life. Attendance at these sessions is required, and important for group cohesion. The Leaders: Pastor Peter Lovett & Elaine Cavanaugh For information, contact (978) 459-9631
item.name: Small Group Gathering to Grow Your Faith
